payload.content: Vertically grown strawberries require 1404 kWh of energy, whereas conventionally grown strawberries in Chile require 0.45 kWh, representing a 3000 times difference in energy consumption.

content: Vertically grown strawberries require 1404 kWh of energy, whereas conventionally grown strawberries in Chile require 0.45 kWh, representing a 3000 times difference in energy consumption.
